tuv.seg: Case study: Working and claiming a State Pension (Non-Contributory)
Cás-staidéar: Ag obair agus ag éileamh Pinsin Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach)
This case study shows the effect of work on State Pension (Non-Contributory) in 2016
Léiríonn an cás-staidéar seo an tionchar a bhíonn ag obair ar Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) in 2016
Joe is 67 years of age and has been claiming a State Pension (Non-Contributory) for a little over a year now
Tá Joe 67 bliain d'aois agus tá sé ag fáil Pinsin Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) le beagnach bliain anuas
He receives an increase in his payment for his wife Jean
Faigheann sé méadú ar a íocaíocht dá bhean chéile Jean
Jean is 62 years old and works part-time as a book-keeper
Tá Jean 62 bliain d'aois agus oibríonn sí go páirtaimseartha mar leabharchoimeádaí
She earns €130 a week net
Tuilleann sí €130 glan in aghaidh na seachtaine
(Net earnings are total earnings less deductions for PRSI, private health insurance, superannuation and union dues.) They have no other income but have savings of €56,000

('Séard is brí le tuillimh ghlana tuillimh iomlána lúide déaduchtaithe i PRSI, árachais sláinte phríobháidigh, aoisliúntais agus dleachta aontais.) Níl ioncam ar bith eile acu ach tá coigilteas €56,000 acu
At the moment Joe's pension payment is the maximum State Pension (Non-Contributory) €368.70
Faoi láthair faigheann Joe an Pinsean Stáit uasta (Neamh-Ranníocach) de €368.70
Their total weekly income is €498.70
Is iomlán a n-ioncaim sheachtainiúil €498.70 é
Joe has been offered some part-time work as a caretaker in a local school
Tairgeadh roinnt oibre páirtaimseartha do Joe mar fheighlí i scoil áitiúil
If he takes the job his net weekly wage will be €260. Jean is thinking of increasing the number of hours she works
Má ghlacann sé leis an bpost beidh pá seachtainiúil aige de €260 Tá Jean ag machnamh ar líon na n-uaireanta a oibríonn sí a mhéadú
Her new net weekly income would be €206
Bheadh ioncam seachtainiúil glan nua aici de €206
Joe wants to know how his State Pension (Non-Contributory) will be affected if he starts work in the local school and Jean increases the number of days she works
Ba mhaith le Joe a fháil amach cén tionchar a bheidh ar a Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) má mhéadaíonn Jean a cuid laethanta oibre agus má thosaíonn sé sa scoil áitiúil
Joe and Jean's new assessable means
Acmhainn inmheasúnaithe nua Joe agus Jean
Joe's assessable income from work (See note 1) €60
Ioncam inmheasúnaithe Joe ó obair (Féach nóta 1) €60
Add Jean's assessable income from work (See note 2) €6
Móide acmhainn inmheasúnaithe Jean ó obair (Féach nóta 2) €6
Add income from savings (See note 3) €16
Móide ioncam ó choigilteas (Féach nóta 3) €16
Divide by 2 to get their assessable weekly means: €41
Roinn ina dhá leath chun a n-acmhainn sheachtainiúil inmheasúnaithe a fháil: €41
Total assessable weekly means (See note 4) €41
Acmhainn sheachtainiúil inmheasúnaithe iomlán (Féach nóta 4) €41
Weekly State Pension (Non-Contributory) (See note 5) €347.90
Pinsean Stáit Seachtainiúil (Neamh-Ranníocach) (Féach nóta 5) €€347.90
Their new total weekly income will be €813.90
€808.90 a bheas mar ioncam iomlán acu
(Total income is made up of Joe's State Pension (Non-Contributory) and their income from work)
(Cuimsíonn an t-iomlán Pinsean Stáit Joe (Neamh-Ranníocach) agus a gcuid ioncaim ó obair)
Joe's assessable income from work: Joe will earn €260 (net) per week
Ioncam inmheasúnaithe Joe ó obair: Tuillfidh Joe €260 (glan) in aghaidh na seachtaine
€200 is not taken into account
Ní thabharfar €200 san áireamh
Therefore Joe's assessable income from work is €60
€60 is ea ioncam inmheasúnaithe Joe ó obair mar sin
Jean's assessable income from work: Jean will earn €206 (net) per week
Ioncam inmheasúnaithe Jean ó obair: Tuillfidh Jean €206 (glan) in aghaidh na seachtaine
€200 is not taken into account
Ní thabharfar €200 san áireamh
Therefore Jean's assessable income from work is €6
€6 is ea ioncam inmheasúnaithe Jean ó obair mar sin
Income from savings for a couple is calculated as follows:
Déantar ioncam ó choigilteas i gcomhair lánúna a ríomh mar a leanas:
│First €40,000 │Nil │
│An chéad €40,000 │Nialas │
│Next €20,000 │€1 per €1,000 per week │
│An chéad €20,000 eile │€1 in aghaidh €1,000 in aghaidh na seachtaine │
│Next €20,000 │€2 per €1,000 per week │
│An chéad 420,000 eile │€2 in aghaidh €1,000 in aghaidh na seachtaine │
│Excess €80,000 │€4 per €1,000 per week │
│De bhreis ar €80,000 │€4 in aghaidh €1,000 in aghaidh na seachtaine │
If you are married or are cohabiting with another person as husband and wife, your means will be taken as half the joint means of you and your spouse/civil partner/cohabitant
Má tá tú pósta nó má tá tú ag maireachtáil i bhfochair a chéile mar lánúin phósta, áireofar do chuid acmhainne mar leath chomhacmhainn do chéile/pháirtnéir sibhialta/chomhchónaitheoir
Joe's new personal rate of State Pension (Non-Contributory) is €209.50
Is é ráta Phinsean Stáit pearsanta Joe (Neamh-Ranníocach) €209.50
He also gets an extra amount or increase of €138.40 for Jean as a qualified adult
Faigheann sé méad €138.40 sa bhreis i gcomhair Jean mar aosach cáilithe freisin
You can find out more about the rate of pension paid after means are assessed
Féadfaidh tú níos mó a léamh faoin ráta pinsin a íoctar tar éis acmhainn a bheith measúnaithe
